title: Aigang (AIX) One Day Trading Volume Hits $44,603.00
content: Aigang (CURRENCY:AIX) traded up 6.3% against the dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM ET on May 26th. One Aigang token can now be purchased for approximately $0.13 or 0.00001709 BTC on exchanges including Kucoin and  Bancor Network. Aigang has a total market capitalization of $2.52 million and approximately $44,603.00 worth of Aigang was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. During the last seven days, Aigang has traded 1.9% higher  against the dollar.    Here’s how similar cryptocurrencies have performed during the last 24 hours:    Get Aigang alerts:     Ripple (XRP) traded 4.4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008401 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003897 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 1.1% against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024703 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded 5.2% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.0608 or 0.00000796 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded up 4% against the dollar and now trades at $56.65 or 0.00741648 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 0.1% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $1.00 or 0.00013107 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 10.3% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $3.74 or 0.00048910 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.4% against the dollar and now trades at $14.63 or 0.00191582 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded 9.4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $7.70 or 0.00100748 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001546 BTC.   Aigang Profile      Aigang was first traded on November 14th, 2017. Aigang’s total supply is 29,274,567 tokens and its circulating supply is 19,321,214 tokens. Aigang’s official Twitter account is @aigangnetwork . The Reddit community for Aigang is /r/aigangnetwork and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here . The official message board for Aigang is medium.com/aigang-network . Aigang’s official website is aigang.network .    Buying and Selling Aigang    Aigang can be purchased on the following cryptocurrency exchanges:  Bancor Network and Kucoin.  It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as Aigang directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to acquire Aigang should first buy Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as GDAX, Changelly or Coinbase . Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to buy Aigang using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
